search.title: Tattoine Doggy Paradise
search.description: The force is strong with this one.

search.title: Alderaan's Getaway
search.description: Well, someday you'll come to Alderaan with me and see for yourself how wonderful it is. Not even you could be cynical about my world.

search.title: Mos Eisleys Pleasant Hideaway
search.description: You'll never find a more wretched hive of scum and villainy
